Summary: Eastbound on I-96, Blueish Disk Like Object Covered in Blue Flame
divs: Sighting DetailsWas traveling Eastbound on I-96 coming home. This event occured Sunday night at about 7:45 in the evening. Around mile 105, what seemed like a blue fireball flew across the sky on a downward angle from right to left. The object appeared to be disc shaped and covered in a blueish flame and tinged with yellow spots. The object was moving very fast and could not have been a plane or any other flying object I can recognize. The object moved from the right to the left and promptly vanished. I was not the only person in the vehicle when this occured and my girlfriend could surely vouch for me. I understand that exit 105 is near the Lansing airport, but this object moved too fast to be a plane. The object caught both mine and my girlfriends attention immediately and we both saw the same object. After seeing the object and then seeing it vanish I remember feeling excited that I had seen something unusual.
